attributes.action: make education policy independent of party politics.
attributes.additional_details:
Education developments and reforms in England should be the responsibility of an elected panel of successful educationists not politicians.
This would be similar to a the medical panel of Doctors.

All reforms and spending should be their remit,and their positions on a executive panel be decided by their contributions to UK education.

This will let English education develop independently of party politic and ill informed whims of one Minister
